name: Shinto Samurai
description:
Neilin is already a thousand years old, an ancient samurai. This is all about her story, in this generation she's weakened.. her true arts were long gone and now she's living a slow life in a remote village, is there still a way to regain her true arts back again? A prowess that are feared by all in her prime time.

Features

Explore

Kill monsters to earn some gold, enjoy exploring the world.

Weapons & Armors

There are more than 10 types of equipments.

Boss Battles

Get rare items and unlock the new map.

Finish the Game

Unlock the ending of the story.

Notes:

This is the first release of the game, live in a world of fantasy!

More feature updates to come!
